titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Adam, Secretary to the Government, Secret Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is confirming the receipt of weapons delivered by the Lord Mintofor the use of the King of Persia, Fat′h Ali Shah Qajar. A detailed list of the items in question is included in the letter. It is noted that the Resident is currently in the process of turning them over to Mahomed Ali Beg [Muḥammad ‘Alī Beg], an officer of the Persian military.
